name: Diagonally
description:
I'm still a game dev newbie, and this will be my first game! It taught me a lot. I built it in a couple of days, and it makes me proud somehow. 

So this game, is a very easy game, and most likely will appeal to kids xD

You drag a diagonal line from bottom left to top right to make a successful line and select squares. You also need to select the correct amount of squares (wow so hard -- sarcasm). 

I will also incorporate this to a bigger game I have in mind, so stay tune for that!

Well, if you have any feedback or any more ideas for next levels please leave a comment below!

Credits:

  • Brainstorming with my friend Piotrek, he's a good artist too check him out: https://www.instagram.com/beyond.eternity/
  • debugging and questions asked in Brackeys Discord
